title: Ticket #515: VM load not considered Condor Load
description:
Condor monitors all processes that is starts on a system to segregate system load average from condor load average. This allows for using load average information in Startd policy expressions.

Condor does not currently monitor VMware, Xen or KVM load. This means a policy that takes into account load average, e.g. the default CS policies, will behave in undesirable ways when load is created by a Condor started VM.

libvirt provides a means to query for the load of a VM.
